records.text: Very informative and well built talk by Daria Caraway at #JSConfBP! I'm always fascinated by TypeScript details and how type logic works under the hood. Reminds me of my CS master with a lot of formal checking stuff. Useful, but I'm not the best in formal checking 😅 https://jsconfbp.com/speakers/daria-caraway

records.text: Last weekend, I participated in Open South Code, and volunteered in the kids event, in which I showed children how to create a comic with HTML and CSS.It wasn't fancy, but kids enjoyed it. And it was amazing to see their reactions when, by changing a class name here or some text there, they could build very different comic strips.To facilitate the process, I coded a small utility-class library to build Batman comics: https://alvaromontoro.com/demos/batman-comic-css/Step aside Tailwind, Batman-Comic.CSS is here 😂
